quests.desc: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an profound round of TextWorld? You do! Here is how to play! First, it would be fantastic if you could travel east. Next, venture north. After that, make an attempt to travel east. Following that, make an attempt to travel north. Once you manage that, take a trip north. Following that, attempt to go to the west. With that over with, make an attempt to travel north. And then, venture west. Then, recover the butterfly from the bench. And then, sit the butterfly on the table in the bathroom. Once that's all handled, you can stop!

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
I never took you for the sort of person who would show up in a bathroom, but I guess I was wrong.

 You see a table. The table is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if] You see a bench. The bench is normal.[if there is something on the s_1] On the bench you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the sauna.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You are in a study. A standard kind of place.

 You can make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] soap scented chest in the room.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The soap scented chest contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The soap scented chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a spare room. A typical kind of place. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You make out a counter. The counter is usual.[if there is something on the s_2] On the counter you make out [a list of things on the s_2]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You're now in the steam room.



There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cubicle. An usual kind of place.

 You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to a stand. The stand is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_3] On the stand you make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You arrive in a studio. A normal kind of place.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You are in an office. A normal one. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You can see a bookshelf. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the bookshelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Silly bookshelf, silly, empty, good for nothing bookshelf.[end if] You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a chair. [if there is something on the s_5]On the chair you see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You make out a mantle. [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the mantle.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]The mantle appears to be empty. You move on, clearly furious with your TextWorld experience.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You are in a shower. A standard one. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You can see [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] safe.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_1]. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a canteen. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] lavender scented locker.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The lavender scented locker contains [a list of things in the c_2]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The lavender scented locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You arrive in a vault. A standard one.

 You can see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] crate.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. There is an unblocked exit to the east.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You arrive in a launderette. An usual one.



There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a laundromat.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a drawer.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_4]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The drawer is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a rack. The rack is standard.[if there is something on the s_7] On the rack you can see [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] The rack appears to be empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a scullery.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a cuboid chest.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The cuboid chest contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The cuboid chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You arrive in a kitchen. A normal kind of place.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You are in a workshop. An ordinary one.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You arrive in a basement. A normal one.

 You make out a shelf. [if there is something on the s_8]On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_8]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]But the thing is empty. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the shelf.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: serious workshop
infos.desc:
You are in a workshop. A serious kind of place.

 You see a suitcase. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
This is going to sound unbelievable, but you've just entered a restroom. You can barely contain your excitement.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a washroom.

 Hey, want to see a board? Look over there, a board. [if there is something on the s_9]You see [a list of things on the s_9] on the board.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]The board appears to be empty.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.desc: it is what it is, a gate [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The soap scented chest looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! First of all, you could, like, venture east. With that done, try to venture north. Then, make an attempt to go east. Then, make an attempt to take a trip north. Then, attempt to venture north. That done, travel west. Next, go north. Then, take a trip west. Then, pick up the butterfly from the bench within the bathroom. After that, put the butterfly on the table in the bathroom. Got that? Good!
